item.description: About The DevOps Maturity specification was inspired by Conventional Branch. Tooling for DevOps Maturity devops-maturity: CLI tool for calculating DevOps Maturity score. Projects Using DevOps Maturity ansible/metrics-utility: Standalone utility for github.com/ansible/awx. cuhacking/2025: Flagship platform for cuHacking’s 2025 hackathon. commit-check: A free, powerful tool that enforces commit metadata, branch naming, and more. ZeusAutomacao/DFe.NET: Biblioteca em C# para emissão e impressão de NFe, NFCe, MDF-e e CT-e. … and more projects using DevOps Maturity.
